sql.query: select * from "detailsUser" inner join "roles" as "r" on "r"."id" = "detailsUser"."rolesId" where "detailsUser"."userId" = ? and "r"."name" <> ?

select "plans".* from "subscriptions" inner join "detailsSubscription" as "ds" on "ds"."subscriptionId" = "subscriptions"."id" inner join "plans" on "plans"."id" = "ds"."plansId" where "subscriptions"."id" = ?
